title: Tallnut

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Produce one sun every night.
-Grant yourself Powerful Defense for tonight. One free charge, then costs 3 suns.
-Grant you and another Plant Powerful Defense for the night. 3 suns.
-Grant 2 Plant Roles Invincible Defense for the night. 4 suns.

desc:
Post 472
*Have you tried a line of Tallnuts with Pumpkin?*
